aboutProject.heading: Na ntina na Projet
aboutProject.paragraph1: Orbital Temple ezali mosala ya ntɔki mpe satellite oyo ezali na mokano ya kozala tempelo oyo esangisi bato nyonso, etongami esika oyo bifelo moko te ekoki kokóma. Esalemi na artiste brésilien Edson Pavoni, artiste sima ya Memorial ya Inumeráveis oyo ekomaki na 1 sur chaque 6 Brésilien na tango ya pandemie ya COVID, projet ebengisi bato ya mokili mobimba batinda kombo ya mutu oyo balingi ba rappeler. Bankombo yango etindamaka na satellite oyo ezali na orbite, mpe yango esalaka ete ezala ekaniseli ya bato nyonso.
aboutProject.paragraph2: Na nzela ya site Internet oyo ezali na minɔkɔ 136, bato oyo bakosala yango basalaka molulu ya sika. Tempelo ya Orbital etalaka mitó ya makambo ya bosangisi, bokundoli, mpe bomoto na biso ya kokabola, kotuna mpo na nini tempelo moko te ya mosuni na Mabele ekoki solo koyamba moto nyonso, mpe kopesa likanisi ya esika lokola esika se moko wapi bosangisi ya radical ekoki kozala.

aboutArtist.heading: Na ntina na Artiste
aboutArtist.paragraph1: Edson Pavoni azali moyemi ya Brésil oyo mobembo na ye ebandaki na balabala ya São Paulo, esika wapi contexte ya bobola mpe mobulu nde ebongisaki bambula na ye ya ebandeli. Na mboka oyo boklisto epesaki nzela mosika na babalabala, bangi, mpe mobulu, Pavoni azwaki ekimelo na kondima, motó ya likambo oyo na nsima, ntango akokóma motyoli ya kobebisama ya lingomba, ekoyebisa momeseno na ye ya ntɔki.
aboutArtist.paragraph2: Na 2020, na tango ya pandemie ya COVID-19, Pavoni asala Inumeráveis (innumerable) , oeuvre d’art na intersection ya art na journalisme. Projet yango etunaki bankoto ya mabota mpe ekomaki masolo ya baye babungisaki na pandemie, kosala esika wapi bokundoli elekaki mituya mpe mituya. Bapowɛti, banzembo mpe ba symphonies esalemaki na masolo yango. Bazulunalo basalaki ba couvertures na kosaleláká bankombo mpe masolo ya kala. Ba stars nionso ya Brésil lokola Fernanda Torres oyo a gagnaki Oscar, mpe ba stars lokola Selton Melo, Eva Wilma, Camila Pitanga, Debora Secco, Tais Araujo na Lazaro Ramos, mpe basusu mingi batangaki masolo wana na télévision nationale. Mosala yango ekómaki na bato milio 32, moko kati na mikóló minei ya Brésil. Ekómaki réseau ya kobikisa, monument collectif ya mémoire.
aboutArtist.paragraph3: Nsima ya masolo koleka nkóto zomi na mawa, motindo moko ebimaki: ntango tozali kolobela moto oyo akufi, toponaka biteni ya lisolo na bango lokola nde tozali kokoma mokanda ya toli epai ya mokɛngɛli ya porte ya paradiso. Tosalaka nyonso mpo na kotinda bango na oyo tondimi ete ezali lola. Mosala oyo ebimisaki bososoli ya sika: Bindimeli na biso na ntina na nani abongi na lola ebongisaka mbala moko nani tondimi to tolongolaka na Mabelé. Ba colonisateurs portugais na Brésil bazalaki kondima que ba Noirs bazali na milimo te; bindimeli yango elongisaki kozala boombo. Soki ozalaki autochtone, soki obotamaki na esika ya mabe to olingaki mutu ya mabe, balobi na yo kaka, tii lelo, ba portes ya lola ekangamaki pona yo. Ezali na emonaneli moko ya mikolo mizali koya oyo etondisami te na koboya?
aboutArtist.paragraph4: Yango nde ndenge Orbital Temple ebotamaki.

team.heading: Ekipe
team.content: Temple orbital esalemi na boyokani na Sathi Roy, Pedro Kaled, João Pedro Polito, Victor Baptista, João Victor Alves, André Biagioni, VK, Jonathan Querubina, Guilherme Bullejos, Eduardo Dias, Roberta Savian Rosa, Clara Marques, Daphne Alves, Flavio Vidigal, Andre Holzmeister, Pedro Vidigal, Tatiane Putti, Rafael Fernandes, Bruna Cairo, Solid Concepts, RiseNY&Partners, IdeaSpace, mpe baoyo nyonso bazali kokoba kopesa makanisi mpo na bankombo mpo na tempelo oyo.

pressCoverage.heading: Emonisami Na / Couverture ya Presse
pressCoverage.paragraph1: Bakobakisama ya bapanzi-nsango mpe makambo mosusu ntango ekokóma. Pona ba mises à jour ya sika, benga équipe na biso ya presse.
pressCoverage.paragraph2: Ba expositions mpe ba features ya kala ezali na ba présentations na 13e Bienal ya Mercosul, reconnaissance na Prix Lumen, mpe pona institut brésilien ya recherche spatiale (INPE).
